mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_verification ( CLIENT_ID, PHONE, CODE, TYPE, EXPIRES_AT, VERIFIED, CREATED_AT, USED_AT ) VALUES ( #{clientId}, #{phone}, #{code}, #{type}, #{expiresAt}, 'N', NOW(), #{usedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE client SET EMAIL_VERIFIED = 'Y' WHERE CLIENT_ID = ( SELECT CLIENT_ID FROM account_verification WHERE CODE = #{code} AND TYPE = 'client_JOIN' )
UPDATE client SET EMAIL_VERIFIED = 'Y' WHERE client_id = #{clientId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM client WHERE CONCAT(email_id, '@', email_domain) = #{email}
SELECT av.* FROM account_verification av JOIN client m ON av.client_id = m.client_id WHERE CONCAT(m.email_id, '@', m.email_domain) = #{email} AND av.type = #{type} ORDER BY av.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
